issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I was looking to use the autolink property for email addresses and phone numbers.  I found out this only works on iOS with a TextArea which seems a bit odd.  Any reason we cannot have autolink available for iOS on Labels and TextFields?
fields.summary: Autolink not available on iOS for Label or TextField

comments.body:
Autolinking as a native property is only available on UITextView(Ti.UI.TextArea on the titanium platform). 

To support links on labels you can use the link event along with the AttributedString.

There is no support for link events on TextField on iOS
Closing ticket as the issue will not fix.
